statements: DELETE FROM rural_infrastructure_projects WHERE location = 'Village A';
DELETE FROM rural_infrastructure_projects WHERE budget > 5000 AND location = 'Village A';
DELETE FROM project_impact WHERE project_id = 1 AND indicator_id = 1;
DELETE FROM ImpactAssessment WHERE impact_rating > 3 AND assessment_date >= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM evaluation_reports WHERE project_id = 3 AND evaluator = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM project_locations WHERE project_id = 3 AND location_id = 5;
